caption.p: Left: SEM micrograph of TD fracture surface, poly(hydroxy butyrate-co-valerate) (PHBV)/zein/alginate film; right: images of several multilayer systems: ( a) PHBV; ( b) PHBV/zein+CNMA; ( c) PHBV/zein + CNMA/PHBV; ( d) PHBV/zein+CNMA/alginate [ 17] (reproduced with permission from SpringerNature).
